name: setup goma.ensure cpython3.install path/to/cpython3.ensure package directory
ensure packages.ensure gsutil.install path/to/gsutil.ensure package directory
ensure packages.ensure bsdtar.install path/to/bsdtar.ensure package directory

cmd:
Host *
  CheckHostIP no
  StrictHostKeyChecking no
  ForwardAgent no
  ForwardX11 no
  UserKnownHostsFile /dev/null
  User fuchsia
  IdentitiesOnly yes
  IdentityFile id_ed25519
  ServerAliveInterval 2
  ServerAliveCountMax 5
  ControlMaster auto
  ControlPersist 1m
  ControlPath /tmp/ssh-%r@%h:%p
  ConnectTimeout 5
name: generate ssh_config at [CACHE]/builder/ssh_config
run FEMU test on arm64.run v2_test
run FEMU test on arm64.run v2_test.launch arm64 emulator with QEMU engine
run FEMU test on arm64.run v2_test.retrieve femu information
run FEMU test on arm64.run v2_test.start fserve
run FEMU test on arm64.run v2_test.publishing v2_test-123.far
run FEMU test on arm64.run v2_test.run ffx test
run FEMU test on arm64.run v2_test.ffx log dump
run FEMU test on arm64.run v2_test.kill fserve
run FEMU test on arm64.run v2_test.stop arm64 emulator
